Annex 3. Nutrition Programme Case Studies
EOS/TSF Programmes (2004–present) are jointly operated by the MoH with UNICEF 
support and the Disaster Risk Management and Food Security Sector with World Food 
Programme support. The EOS targets children 6–59 months for vitamin A supplementation, 
measles vaccination, insecticide-treated bednets in malarial areas, health messages and 
deworming. Children 6–59 months and pregnant and lactating women (PLW) are also
